survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Pet Food Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who use subscription-based pet food delivery services to understand their satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use a subscription-based pet food delivery service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to easily categorize frequency.

script.question_text: How often do you use a subscription-based pet food delivery service?

questions.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to subscribe to a pet food delivery service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse motivations.

script.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to subscribe to a pet food delivery service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of pet food options available through your subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of pet food options available through your subscription service?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your current pet food subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your current pet food subscription service?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your pet food subscription service to other pet owners?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/maybe question to gauge likelihood of recommendation.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your pet food subscription service to other pet owners?
